reviewText: I owned 1-3 on DVD then when I saw this version was available in Blu-Ray I was ready to order.  I was not disappointed.  The picture and sound transfer was great.  The picture quality for these films shows true HD experience.  Any fan of the series should get this awesome collection!
summary: Great to finally have these great comedies all in HD
Title: N/A

reviewText: Great way to have all of them in one collection.  However, the sleeve can be a pain to put back on and most of the movies are not unrated.  Other than that, it is still a good deal and nice to have without having to get each Blu Ray case out.
Title: N/A

reviewText: For fans of the American Pie movies, this box set is a "must have". I am loving this set !!!

reviewText: American pie 1,2,3 and the reunion, This actors really know how to entertain.If you havent got this, you wont regret it.The only thing tho, the package was made in the UK, so the Digital copies can't be redeemed unless you are in UK.
summary: One of the best commedies of my teenager time
Title: N/A

reviewText: You get American Pie, American Pie 2, American Wedding, and American Reunion in this 4-disc UK collection. The first film is the unrated cut. All the extras are contained on the American Reunion disc. Overall, the picture and audio quality are average. US customers should know that the UK digital copy codes do not work in the US. These are 4 star films in a 3 star package.Language: English
summary: 4 American Pie Movies on UK Blu-ray Collection

reviewText: Looking at some of the comments, people are saying these are the UK releases.  Even though this is true, the movies still work just fine on my Xbox ONE.  As long as you can do without the digital copies, you should be fine..

reviewText: Great price.  Came quick.  Nice to get all the movies in a small pack.  Don't take up much room in the shelf.
